iti32:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti32:2.1: “Mendicants, a person with two qualities is cast down to hell.
iti32:2.4: A person who has these two qualities is cast down to hell.”
iti32:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti32:3.5: when their body breaks up, that witless person
iti32:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
